**Welcome to the ENVX1002 lab handbook.** This handbook is designed to be a useful companion to the lectures, labs and assessments.

## How to use this handbook

Read this handbook before, or *after* each lecture to better understand certain concepts. Lab exercises are also included in this handbook, which you can use to prepare for the lab sessions.

To begin, we strongly suggest that you read our introduction chapter, which will provide you with an overview of why ENVX1002 is important for your degree and includes some introductory statistical concepts.
